metadata.name: Translucent
metadata.description:
TOOLS OF THE TRADE is a collection of work by 1980kâ€”a representation of the creative techniques used in his daily craft.  

Ascii art is mixed with light diffusion so that objects beyond are liquified. A representation of my daily tools such as Cursor, Pen, and Type inside computer windows.

I created the original Cursor, Pen, and Type tools with neon glass and converted the image to ascii art before placing it into the visual.

Artwork by 1980k 
1/1
